Sponsors

Acknowledgement

Thank you to the players, parents, coaches, and volunteers whose support and effort make the Goal Digger Dangle 2025 possible.

© Goal Digger Dangle 2025 | All Rights Reserved.

Northwest Warrriors

The Northwest Warriors bring a strong mix of skill, determination, and team-first hockey to the tournament. This group of talented U15 players is known for their work ethic, smart plays, and steady growth throughout the season. Parents and fans can expect disciplined hockey, confident skating, and a team that supports each other on and off the ice.


Girls Hockey Club Flyers

The Flyers arrive with speed, creativity, and a commitment to developing every player on their roster. This U15 group plays an exciting brand of hockey built on skill building, teamwork, and a positive team culture. They compete hard, lift one another up, and bring an inspiring energy that families and fans will appreciate.


Medicine Hat Royals

The Medicine Hat Royals are a determined U15 squad that plays with heart, discipline, and a passion for continuous improvement. Known for strong fundamentals and a supportive team environment, the Royals show up ready to work, learn, and compete. Their players bring enthusiasm to every shift and consistently make their community proud.


Southeast Edmonton Recreation Association

SEERA fields a talented and well-rounded U15 team that blends structure, speed, and teamwork. These players are committed to growing their game while building friendships and confidence along the way. With a respectful, hard-working approach to competition, SEERA showcases the best of youth hockey and the values that families care about.
